mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT h.pr_order_cd , h.pr_order_dt FROM pr_order_header h, pr_order o WHERE h.pr_order_cd = o.pr_order_cd AND o.pr_end_dt IS NULL ORDER BY 1
SELECT * FROM pr_order p, edcts e WHERE p.pro_cd = e.pro_cd AND pr_order_cd = #{prOrderCd} ORDER BY p.pro_cd

SELECT * FROM process_tbl t, prcs_result r, prcs p, process_material m, emp e WHERE t.pr_order_cd = r.pr_order_cd AND t.pro_cd = r.pro_cd AND t.prcs_cd = r.prcs_cd AND t.prcs_cd = p.prcs_cd AND t.pr_order_cd = m.pr_order_cd AND t.pro_cd = m.pro_cd AND t.prcs_cd = m.prcs_cd AND r.worker = e.emp_code(+) AND t.pr_order_cd = #{prOrderCd} AND t.pro_cd = #{proCd} ORDER BY t.bom_sq
SELECT * FROM eqm e, prcs p WHERE e.eqm_type = p.eqm_type AND p.prcs_cd = #{prcsCd} AND e.eqm_avail = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM emp e, detail_code d WHERE e.emp_code = d.basic_code||d.detail_code AND d.detail_avail = 'Y'
